adviseScripts.text: Commander.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: I heard your schedule has been exhausting lately.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: Take this opportunity to get some rest and relaxation at the Outpost.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: Thank you. I'll get some rest.
I'm afraid not. No way I'm letting my guard down.
I knew it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: You are not taking the mission seriously enough.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: I must do a better job of training you to stay focused.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: ... Good.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: In wartime, letting your guard down is no different from surrender.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: Our training continues tomorrow.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: I talk with Delta about training.
Lately,
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: I am worried that I have been too harsh when talking to Signal.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: I don't think so. You sound warm and kind.
You really should treat Signal better.
Incorrect.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: No need to comfort me with lies.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: I see.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: Thank you for your sincere feedback.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: I talk with Delta about Signal.
What kind of food do you prefer?
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: Spicy, or not spicy?
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: In war, any food will do.
Not spicy.
That is correct, Commander.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: Rations are a valuable resource in war.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: This is the only opinion that matters.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: ... Is that so?
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: Your answer is spoken without great conviction.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: Yet, I still choose to believe you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: I talk with Delta about our favorite foods.
Seraphim advised me to get some rest,
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: but all I want to do is train.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: What is the correct course of action?
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: Take the effort you would have put into rest and put it into training.
Follow Seraphim's advice.
I had not considered this approach!
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: I will give your proposal careful consideration.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: Is that your official opinion, Commander?
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: Apologies. I cannot neglect my training.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: I must consider alternative solutions.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: I talk with Delta about taking breaks.
Commander, do you have a type?
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: Why do you ask?
I like people who work hard for themselves.
Answering a question with a question is considered impolite, Commander.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: I ask because I infer that many of the Nikkes are curious about what you like.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: But if you don't have one, that is also an acceptable answer.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: I see.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: Hard work... an admirable answer.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: When the Nikkes hear this, I believe it will motivate them to better themselves.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: I have a serious conversation about types with Delta.
Someone asked me about my hobbies. I said my hobby is training.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: They thought it was a joke.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: Is it funny to treat training as a hobby?
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: Nothing could be more serious than training.
Maybe they just thought your answer was unusual.
I am happy that you think so.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: Yet, you did not answer my question.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: I cannot understand what is unusual about my answer.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: However, your reply has given me a clue about how others see me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: Thank you for your advice.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Delta about hobbies.
Commander.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: What goes through your mind during battle?
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: I'm thinking about how to save everyone.
I'm thinking about how to win.
Save... everyone?
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: What a naive and arrogant answer.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: But,
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: I honestly appreciate your concern.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: Of course. That is the only possible answer.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Delta about thoughts during battle.
I've heard that music can bring you inner peace.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: Could you recommend some music?
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: Julia's violin performance.
Military anthems.
Hm... Her music does exhibit calming effects.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: However, I do not enjoy it. I do not know why.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: The purpose of a military anthem is not to create inner peace.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: But, in my case, perhaps it would work perfectly.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: Thank you for your advice.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Delta about music for a while.
Signal invited me to the Royal Road today,
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: but I never feel at ease in that kind of place.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: How should I decline her offer?
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: Just tell her you'll be training.
Think of it as team building.
I thought you would at least give me a well-considered answer.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: Team building...
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: Fine. If I see it as a mission with an objective, I can accept it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: Thank you for your advice.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: Delta and I discuss ways to adapt to Royal Road.
Someone once told me,
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: I live my life like there is no future.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: I suppose it is true. I have never considered the future.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: Do you ever think about it, Commander?
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: No. I live in the moment.
All the time.
Is that so, Commander?
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: I feel the same way.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: I want to live my life to the fullest, not waste it longing for a distant future.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: It suits me better.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: Really?
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: I agree that it is good to hold a dream in your heart, but...
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: If you think too much about the future,
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: you will feel miserable in the present. I hope you will take this into consideration.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: I have a deep discussion about the present and the future with Delta.
I don't invest in anything unless it truly impresses me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: That's why I think Signal is awesome.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: What are you willing to invest your time and money into?
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: Something that piques my interest.
Someone that piques my interest.
You don't say...
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: As for me, my interests lie in work-related tasks and training.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: It's hard for me to imagine being interested in much else.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: Is that something that you make a habit of doing?
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: Very well then, I'll try to invest in you a little more, Commander.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: Delta and I invest our time and energy into having a discussion.
I think it's important to set personal goals for yourself.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: What are you setting out to accomplish this year, Commander?
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: To just get through it alive.
To reclaim the surface.
Sure, keeping yourself out of harm's way is important,
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: but I thought someone like you
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: would have set a more defined goal for themselves.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: I thought you would say that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: I myself aspire to the same goal.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: I will do everything I can to make it happen.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: Delta and I promised each other that we would succeed with our goals.
I've heard hobbies can be more enjoyable when done with other people.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: So I was thinking about picking up one of your hobbies, so we can share it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: What are you setting out to accomplish this year, Commander?
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: What pastimes do you often indulge in?
Weapons research.
As in, the mall and all of that?
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: I'm not a very materialistic person, so I'm not sure whether that will suit me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: Still, I'll give it a try.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: I didn't know you were so interested in weaponry.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: That's something I'd gladly participate in.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: Let me know the next time you're conducting any weapons research.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: Delta and I speak more on the topic of hobbies.
What would you do
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: if we fail to reclaim the surface and things merely remain as they are?
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: I'd refuse to give up.
I would feel quite exasperated.
As expected, you were never a quitter.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: No matter where this path we're on leads us, I'll follow you until the very end.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: If the days pass without any noticeable change,
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: it will get to the best of us, even if it is you, Commander.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: But don't you worry
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: since I will never give up.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: Delta and I continue to have a conversation about the future.
I've heard certain animals dance upon hearing compliments.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: If you received a compliment, what type of dance would you like to do?
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: Shouldn't you be asking me what kind of compliment I'd want to hear instead?
Popping and locking.
Oh, is that what I should be focusing on?
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: Actually, I just wanted to see you dance.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: All right then, what kind of compliment would you like to be given?
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: I don't know what dance that is, but I'm sure it's great.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: I'll be sure to shower you with some compliments soon.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: Delta and I talk about the positive power of complimenting others.
Hey Commander, how are you feeling?
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: Great.
Not so good.
You always keep yourself in tip-top shape.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: However, you are still human, so it's easy to overexert yourself.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: Therefore, you must continue to build up your stamina.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: Let's train together later.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: Have you not been taking good care of yourself?
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: Although it's good not to have a lax attitude towards everything.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: it's just as important to rest whenever your body is telling you it doesn't feel well.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: You're not a Nikke, after all.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: Delta and I have a conversation about the health condition.
I always end up making the same mistakes during training.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: I'm worried that I'll make the same mistake when out in the field.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: Do you have any advice for me?
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: Trust yourself.
Trust me.
Because I keep repeating the same mistake,
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: I end up questioning myself, when I should be trusting myself.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: ... I apologize for being so weak.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: Very well...
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: Since you have trust in me, I will trust you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: Thank you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: Suddenly, I feel a chill for some reason.
Delta and I talk about the influence one's mindset can have.
Do you think it's important how food tastes?
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: Of course it is.
No, it's not terribly important.
I'm not so sure I agree.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: Of course, it's nice if the food you're eating tastes good,
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: but in times of war, more pressing matters take precedence.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: I feel the same way.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: In times of war, we cannot afford the luxury of being so fussy about how our food tastes.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: So I'm thankful even to have prepackaged rations.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: Delta and I talk more about food and its taste.
I'm considering letting the other Nikkes in the Outpost join in on our morning training.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: Could you please transmit a bugle call from the radio tower at approximately 6 AM?
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: Private {AccountData.NickName}, reporting for duty!
... I don't think that's such a good idea.
You sound very convincing!
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: Will you be joining us in the morning as well?
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: You don't think so?
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: To be fair, even I was getting a little tired of the wake-up call.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: Any other recommendations as far as the music we can play to get people up and out of bed?
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: Delta and I discuss what music would be best to wake up others in the morning.
These new Nikkes recruits have no discipline.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: What do you think, Commander?
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: We'd have never allowed such indolence back in my day.
Well, they're still just a bunch of greenhorns.
I couldn't agree more.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: We can't allow such a sad state of affairs to continue.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: I'll arrange for some special late-night training sessions.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: That's no excuse!
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: We must give them proper training so that they can work together down the line.
adviseScripts.speaker: Delta

adviseScripts.text: Delta and I reminisce about our days as new recruits back in the day.
